function.description: Connect to a Microsoft SQL Server

parameterDescriptions.parameterDescription: The string that will be used to connect to the database.

function.longDescription:
To connect to MSSQL you need to provide a connection string that contains all the required information. The simple format of the connection string is:
jdbc:sqlserver://[serverName[\instanceName][:portNumber]][;property=value[;property=value]]
Example:
jdbc:sqlserver://localhost;databaseName=AdventureWorks;integratedSecurity=true;applicationName=MyApp;
Read more at: [What is the URL format used by MSSQL?](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/connect/jdbc/building-the-connection-url?view=sql-server-ver15)
